author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to AMD for sponsoring this series and being a great partner! Check out their newest greatest gaming offerings at https://lmg.gg/vzq6t

Head over to https://bit.ly/42qBbmg to enter to win an AMD Ultimate Gaming Bundle which includes: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X3D CPU, MAG X870E TOMAHAWK Motherboard, 32GB Ram, Steamdeck OLED 1TB, and Govee Hexagon Panel Lights!

What happens when you give a fashion designer $5000 to upgrade their tech?  Well today we find out in Bridget’s AMD Upgrade!

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1608511-my-most-fashionable-tech-upgrade/

title: My Most Fashionable Tech Upgrade
